name: 2D Beat 'Em Up
description:
Small prototype made in Godot in 2 days. It is buggy and rough but I'm going to be polishing it.

Controls: A, D - Movement || Spacebar - Jump || Left Mouse Click - Attack

PD: Most assets I used are CC0 but if you own any of the assets (sounds, sprites and/or music) and want to be credited feel free to leave me a message telling me how to properly credit you.

Music by:

ANtarcticbreeze: https://www.jamendo.com/track/1347005/extreme-sports-or-nu-metal
Scream Inc.: https://www.jamendo.com/track/1460209/higher-and-higher
Got No Choice: https://www.jamendo.com/track/1522698/neon-instrumental
DimmyPlus: https://www.jamendo.com/track/1659147/energetic-driving-action-rock
ROBOTS: https://www.jamendo.com/track/1604108/power-energetic-sport-action-rock
